Articles.Content:
As it turned out, the charger cable for my laptop was viciously eaten by my rolling chair while I wasn't looking. As in: it became entangled under the chair. So I rolled back in order to reach a certain object, and the computer was pulled off my table. Long story short, it's now completely dysfunctional. Since I can't buy myself a computer, chances are that I won't be playing KSP or anything else for the next few years. Therefore, I may cease to find a use in this forum. This is just a heads up. You guys were a great community.

Edited July 25, 2017 by technicalfool
Just a little snip.

Huh? There's a lot more in this forum than KSP discussion. You could talk about science in the science labs science and space flight subforum. You could just talk about general stuff in the lounge. The forum games could be a source of entertainment. Of course, it's your choice, but I do recommend staying in this community, which is quite a cordial one, considering that it is on the internet.

Think twice Matchu! The Lounge and the Science and Spaceflight subforum is here for you. Im pretty sure you are not the only non-KSP player here.

Anyways, its your move!

i m gonna say like usual, take a break a breath if you feel the need or kinda forced/pushed too, "life is strange", and get back later or not eventually , time do it all & often by itself, give it some ^^ ++ 

Edited July 24, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''

Yeah, I haven't played KSP since 1.0.5 and I still aimlessly roam the forums.

You can always use your mobile to use the forums, too.
I've taken some long breaks from KSP, but still found interesting stuff to do on the forum, like art.

Take a little step back, AND LISTEN CAREFULLY

I DON'T KNOW WHAT KIND OF PAN-PACIFIC CRAP

YOU ARE TRYING TO TELL TO US

BUT YOU HAVE TO FREAKING RETHINK EVERYTHING

I WENT 4 MONTHS NOT PLAYING KSP

AND YOU KNOW WHAT?

I NEVER QUIT THE FORUMS

IN FACT, NO FREAKING BODY 

WHO REALLY ENJOYS THE COMMUNITY

LEAVES

BUT, IF YOU NEED SOMETHING TO DO

TEND TO DO SOMETHING

MAKE CHALLENGES

WRITE STUFF

SUGGEST STUFF

CREATE STUFF

MESSAGE PEOPLE

REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

But yeah if you don't meet your weekly post quota we're sending the KSP mafia after you
